column5: Congrats on the safe arrival of your son.
Congrats Mark!!!
Congrat's!
Now theres a keeper congrats Fishdawg ... soon you will have a fishing buddie for life ...
I was totally expecting to see a Pickerel!!  Congrats man!  Tony
Awesome... enjoy them while they are small, man do they grow up quickly! Congrats to you and your family! HH
Congratulations.

Mebbe you should get yerself one of those fighting chairs to keep him safe in the Crestliner.  Congratulations to all of you. Some folks will tell you the first born is the most powerful experience for Dad, but the only difference with the second is the doctor doesn't make you sit down cuz you look like yer gonna pass out. 32 years later I can still recall going around in a daze for hours after our first arrived. Part of it I think was fear that I wasn't nearly ready to be a Dad and part was excitement about all the great things we were gonna share. Next thing I knew they were asking for the car keys, but we had great times along the way. It all goes by too darned fast, so don't miss any of it.  Again, congratulations Pop, JF
Ya know, if you held him a little closer to the camera, he'd look even bigger!  lol  Congratulations Fishdawg( and Mrs. Fishdawg )on the arrival of Jeffery!!!  What a happy day!
Congratulations!!!! I have 2 rug rats of my own and last week my brother's wife gave birth to triplets so welcome to the lack of sleep club!!! (but it is soooo worth it, they are too damned cute).
Congratulations!
Awesome!!!  Congrats!
Great news, Fishdawg.  Congratulations to you and your wife.
congrats mark!
Warmest congrat's Mark, now the fun starts....  John..
that's awesome! Congratulations on the new fishing partner
aweosme news!  Cheers!
Congrats fishdawg. Great looking family.  Mike
Congrats. He's a big'n. Your life will never be the same ....... in a VERY good way. Enjoy every moment, they go way to fast.
congrats!
....That's fantastic Mark, your going to love being a dad. The three of you make a nice family.
Congrats man! Simply Awesome!  Gerritt.
Congrats on the baby!!!
Congrats Bud! One of life's best catches....

Hey folks, please pardon my lack of posting for the last while... have been hitting the water hard every week of late, i'll get around to throwing up some photos sometime soon.... today was a great day though - my new fishing buddy & first child for my wife & I was born this afternoon  here's Jeffrey  8lbs 14oz & 20 1/4"   we're allready swapping lies!   gotta go to the garage now & find a way to secure the car seat to the Crestliner
Congrats dude!!!!
congratulations!!!!!!!!! Your life will never be the same, better, but never the same. I remember when......
Wow...congrats!!!  What a great PB!!!  Enjoy every single moment....they grow up so fast.  Cliff and Carole
Congrats Dude!  Another keeper!
Great catch!
Great news, congrats.
That's awesome Mark.  Congratulations to you and your wife  Joey
Congratulations Mark!!  Cheers, Ben
Thats a keeper! Congrats!
Congrats on the new arrival!!!! I know the feeling well.
A truly great day for you and your wife, Mark. Congrats to you both. Time to start a fishing fund for the lad.
Congrats a happy occasion to welcome a new fishing buddy. Remember all the fishing you miss for the next couple of years will be more than made up for down the road.
I thought from the title that it might be a huge bass, but it's even better!!!! Congratulations to you and your wife Mark.  Life has just become more than it ever was.
congrats!
And the OFC family grwos again Congrats  Maureen
Congrats! 8-14? can he walk yet? LOL
Koochee, koochee, koo....congratulations to both of you.
Wonderful news Mark & a BIG welcome to Jeffrey  Congratulations to your entire family !!
congrats
great news  Congratulations
Congratulations!!
What a cutie!!!  Congrats Mark, glad to see that Andrea is doing well!
Congrats Mark to you and your wife. Nothing better than a little fishing buddy.
ALRIGHT MARK.  CONGRATS MY FRIEND.  You all did good.
